Creates a link.

Parameters:
target - The file with the contents
link - The file that will point to target
absoluteLink - If true then the absolute path will be used for the link contents, if false, relative

Method Detail

available

public static boolean available()
Determine if this class is usable on this system

Returns:
true if you can use this class to read links and create them.

_relative

public static String _relative(File from,
                               File to)
Gets a relative path from one file to another. for example: from=/Users/me/test.txt to=/Users/you/temp.txt return=../temp.txt

Parameters:
from - The starting point
to - The target
Returns:
A relative path from from to to

main

public static void main(String... args)
Test.

Parameters:
args - Each file will be treated as a symlink and the ouput for each will be displayed.
